DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study evaluate effectiveness functional electrical stimulation ( FES ) provide implanted pulse generator ( IPG ) correct hip , knee ankle function improve walk people partial paralysis .
DOC.brief_title: Improving Ambulatory Community Access After Paralysis
DOC.detailed_description: In surgical procedure electrode insert muscle low extremity correct hip , knee ankle function . The electrode lead connect implanted pulse generator locate abdomen . After typical post-operative period two five day , recipient discharge home two six week moderate activity . Following 6 week period laboratory exercise training , functional use neuroprosthesis begin home community follow-up evaluation 1 , 3 , 6 12 month . Laboratory assessment include walk speed distance , physiologic cost , muscle strength , measure spasticity , gait analysis without stimulation . A number self-reporting instrument administer capture individual 's participation , quality life various aspect perceive community ambulation .
